analysis.description:
UnicornBase (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#152-534) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#278-293)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#306-309)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#425-430)

UnicornBase.setGene (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#459-465) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- unicorns[_unicornId].gene.length == 0

UnicornBase.setGene (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#459-465) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- unicorns[_unicornId].gene.length == 0
UnicornBase.setName (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#448-456) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tmp.length == 0)

Reentrancy in UnicornBase.clearApprovalAndTransfer (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#317-331):
	External calls:
	- removeUnicorn(_from,_unicornId) (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#325-326)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ownedUnicorns (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#326-327)
	- ownedUnicornsIndex (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#326-327)
	- totalUnicorns (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#326-327)
	- unicornOwner (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#326-327)
UnicornBase.maxFreezingIndex should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xcf0010af06edff540af798d06e866d95cbdc8488.sol#172-173)
